mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "Square Dance Tours and Travel", "A Candid Look at Square Dance Travel", Vox Sailatoris-A Square Dancer Speaks Up", "CALLERLAB Quarterly Selection", "Dancer Profile", "Observations on Advanced Dancing", "Take A Good Look", "Formations" and "Come to Canada and Dance". This edition also includes the regular features entitled "As I See It", "Discovery", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Traditional Treasury", "Roundancer Module", "Paging the Round Dancers", "Contra Corner", "Ladies on the Square", "Style Lab", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Callers/Teachers Workshop", "Caller of the Month", "On the Record", "Current Releases", "Square Dance Date Book", "Fashion Feature", "Publications Profile", and "National Convention".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
